text: Enrique Pérez Díaz (28 December 1938 – 10 February 2021), known as Pachín, was a Spanish footballer who played as a defender. Pachín signed for Real Madrid in 1959 from Segunda División club CA Osasuna. He made his La Liga debut on 11 September 1960. Pachín won eight caps for the Spain national team, during three years. Pachín died on 10 February 2021, aged 82.Official Announcement: passing of Enrique Pérez 'Pachín' ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish footballers Category:Spanish football managers
title: Pachín
